original_text: Those tending the pigs ran off, went into the town and reported all this, including what had happened to the demon-possessed men.
korean_text: 치던 자들이 달아나 시내에 들어가 이 모든 일과 귀신 들린 자의 일을 고하니

sentences.original_text: Those tending the pigs ran off
including what had happened to the demon-possessed men
sentences.korean_translation: 귀신 들린 사람들에게 일어난 일을 포함하여
